ModMetaData.name: Cleansweepers Are Basic Mechs
ModMetaData.author: GeodesicDragon
ModMetaData.description:
It didn't make sense to me that the Cleansweeper was only unlocked once you researched Standard Mechtech, despite cleaning being a basic job, so I made this mod which patches it to be available after researching Basic Mechtech.
It also changes the gestation recipe to use a basic subcore instead of a regular one (but the steel cost remains the same).
